meanings.definition: The state or quality of being temporary.
meanings.sent1: The temporariness of the snow made it melt quickly.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the temporariness of summer vacation.
meanings.sent3: The temporariness of the situation made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the temporariness of a shooting star.
meanings.sent5: The temporariness of childhood is a reminder to cherish every moment.

meanings.definition: The temporary nature or duration of something.
meanings.sent1: We must accept the temporariness of this job assignment.
meanings.sent2: The temporariness of the exhibit disappointed art enthusiasts.
meanings.sent3: The temporariness of the power outage led to a spontaneous picnic.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was as fleeting as the temporariness of a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The temporariness of the flowers blooming in spring is a beautiful sight.
